TopicTitle: What Mod has the little radial mount Science Storage thingy?

Articles.Content: Argh, I had it before .23.5 but now I can't find it. It's a little thing that you can store science in. I thought it was KAS but I reinstalled KAS and its not there. Anyone got an idea?
Talisar has one in his tanks pack too... Spherical-and-Toroidal-Tank-Pack

I use the Tarsier Space Tech mod to store science.

Although the main part of the mod is a telescope (which is really cool) it also comes with two different hard drives (integrated in the tech tree) to store your experiments. What I like about those drives is that they give you a slight penalty on the science, but give you more science than when you transmit data.

Check it out!

Talisar has one in his tanks pack too... Spherical-and-Toroidal-Tank-Pack

Thanks fellas. This was it.
i like this one http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/radial-experiment-storage-container/ no other clutter parts, just the radial science mod.
